text: Amitabh Harivansh Bachchan is an Indian movie actor. He has been in over 200 Indian movies in more than forty years. Amitabh Bachchan is widely thought of as one of the greatest and most influential actors in the history of Indian cinema. Amitabh Bachchan has won many major awards in his career. His awards include three National Film Awards as Best Actor and fourteen Filmfare Awards. Amitabh Bachchan made his Hollywood debut in 2013 with The Great Gatsby. ==References== ==Further reading== * Mazumdar, Ranjani. Bombay Cinema: An Archive of the City. title: Amitabh Bachchan
